title: Outlook for Equity Markets
description: With valuations and rising interest rates, Goldman Sachs' Brett Nelson, head of tactical asset allocation for the Investment Strategy Group, discusses the outlook for U.S. equity markets.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: With valuations and rising interest rates, Goldman Sachs' Brett Nelson, head of tactical asset allocation for the Investment Strategy Group, discusses the outlook for U.S. equity markets.
